ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response shows awareness of the context but lacks naturalness in phrasing and could be more aligned with persona consistency.
baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>A standard, neutral approach that is consistent with no additional context provided.

The response is highly relevant to the context, consistent with the persona of a strict and fair Gatekeeper who would not easily grant access without proper credentials. The dialogue feels natural for an NPC in this role within the given scenario.
